mapper.select: update INSBMarketPrize set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},prizename = #{prizename},prizetype = #{prizetype},counts = #{counts},effectivetime = #{effectivetime},terminaltime = #{terminaltime},effectivedays = #{effectivedays},status = #{status},autouse = #{autouse} where id = #{id}
